categories: Category:Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection 3

The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection 3 is the third issue of the fortnightly magazine by De Agostini. It is an officially licensed source of Star Wars information, under Lucas Licensing and the LucasBooks imprint. This unique issue includes two die-cast collectible models, rather than one, and is longer than other magazines in the series.
